overview:
Dony Ang was a founding member of Jamdat ( acquired by Electronic Arts for $680MM in 2005 ). He’s the head of Analytics and Business Intelligence system of the company - playing critical roles in collecting, supplying information and advising the Executive team about the direction of the company based on the data-driven decision makings.

After the successful exit with Jamdat, he worked for different companies as Lead / Chief Big Data Architectures for companies such as : Google, Yahoo & Electronic Arts.
